channel.title: Fusion Isle [Client] [Server Src][Cleaned BS] [Battlscape 317 Client] [7k+ DL's]
channel.description:
Fusion Isle .: Features :. Fully Working Clan Chat! Fully Working Barrows (Need to dig to enter a crypt)! Fully Custom God Wars! Custom Void Knight Exchange Interface Clickable Links in Chat box! Correct God Sword Stances With Specials! New Teleporting GFX Items Kept on Death Interface Correct Equipment interface + Shows Items Pest Control w/Rewards Kalphite Queen Fight Caves, all 63 Waves. King Black Dragon Fully Working Clan Wars! Crafting and Herblore Added! Fully Added Duel Arena! Thieving and Pickpocketing! Full Mining & Ability to Prospect Rocks! Player and PK Following! Stable - I fixed most of the issues that was making it crash randomly Ranging & Magic have hit delays with correct animations Perfect teleporting, with correct delays, and animations Prayers working - Including piety and chilvary! Recoiling Vengeance! TzTok-Jad with correct delays, along to help him is his Healers once he reaches half Hitpoints RuneScape Wilderness levels with correct Attacking ranges Items kept on Death screen shows the items you will be protecting upon death! Photo: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/eznyft.jpg[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/14n1qh.jpg[/img] .: Other Features :. EXP rate is 120 a hit per 1 damage, and it varies between non-combat skills. (Including Range) A Guide in the beginning of the game that takes you around and shows you different places. An In-Game Price Check Feature Boss Monsters .: Client Features :. Auto cache downloading. (When you download client you download the cache via Medafire) Server Download:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?vjm0mzyzlm5
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jemfn4nnig0 Enjoy:)

item.title: Fusion Isle [Client] [Server Src][Cleaned BS] [Battlscape 317 Client] [7k+ DL's]
item.dc:creator: @MrJuff MrJuff
item.description:
@MrJuff wrote:

Fusion Isle

.: Features :.

Fully Working Clan Chat!
Fully Working Barrows (Need to dig to enter a crypt)!
Fully Custom God Wars!
Custom Void Knight Exchange Interface
Clickable Links in Chat box!
Correct God Sword Stances With Specials!
New Teleporting GFX
Items Kept on Death Interface
Correct Equipment interface + Shows Items
Pest Control w/Rewards
Kalphite Queen
Fight Caves, all 63 Waves.
King Black Dragon
Fully Working Clan Wars!
Crafting and Herblore Added!
Fully Added Duel Arena!
Thieving and Pickpocketing!
Full Mining & Ability to Prospect Rocks!
Player and PK Following!
Stable - I fixed most of the issues that was making it crash randomly
Ranging & Magic have hit delays with correct animations
Perfect teleporting, with correct delays, and animations
Prayers working - Including piety and chilvary!
Recoiling Vengeance!
TzTok-Jad with correct delays, along to help him is his Healers once he reaches half Hitpoints
RuneScape Wilderness levels with correct Attacking ranges
Items kept on Death screen shows the items you will be protecting upon death!

Photo:

eznyft.jpg762×498

.: Other Features :.

EXP rate is 120 a hit per 1 damage, and it varies between non-combat skills. (Including Range)
A Guide in the beginning of the game that takes you around and shows you different places.
An In-Game Price Check Feature
Boss Monsters

.: Client Features :.
Auto cache downloading. (When you download client you download the cache via Medafire)

Server Download:

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?vjm0mzyzlm5

Client:

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jemfn4nnig0

Enjoy:)
